alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 26 at 1:27PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Gust winds and icy roads expected across much of northern and central Nevada tonight... Icy road conditions will continue tonight as roads refreeze in spots across northern and central Nevada. Gusty winds will also continue tonight, leading to some drifting of snow back on to roads. Use caution while traveling as the roads can be hazardous. Ice may not always be obvious and could be just a thin layer known as black ice. This can occur on bridges and overpasses even while the rest of the road does not have ice. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
